property.name: Environment/Source Code Control/SVNAuthentication
property.long: Specifies if authentication is supplied with each command.

property.name: Environment/Source Code Control/SVNShowUpdates
property.long: Specifies if show-updates option is supplied with the status command.

property.name: Environment/Source Code Control/SVNPreferredUserName
property.long: Default user name to use, e.g. 'jad'.

property.name: Environment/Source Code Control/GITPreferredUserName
property.long: Default author name to use, e.g. 'John Doe'.

property.name: Environment/Source Code Control/GITPreferredUserEmail
property.long: Default author e-mail address to use, e.g. 'John.Doe@example.com'.

property.name: Environment/Source Code Control/HGPreferredUserName
property.long: Default user name to use, e.g. 'John Doe'.

property.name: Environment/Source Code Control/HGPreferredUserEmail
property.long: Default user e-mail address to use, e.g. 'John.Doe@example.com'.
